context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call a taxi, Uber, or any other quick transport service to take him to the airport while he arranges for his car to be towed or repaired later
call for a taxi, Uber, or any other car service right away so they can get him to the airport on time, while also contacting roadside assistance to take care of his broken down car
call a taxi, an Uber, or a friend to pick him up quickly while also contacting a towing service for his broken-down car
call a taxi, uber, or any other ride sharing service to get him to the airport as fast as possible
call a taxi, Uber, or any other ride-hail service to ensure he reaches the airport in time for his flight
call for a taxi or a ride-hailing service like Uber to get to the airport
call a taxi, a ride share service like Uber or Lyft, or roadside assistance so he can get his car towed and still make it to the airport on time
call for a tow truck or roadside assistance to help with his broken car, while also ordering a taxi, Uber or Lyft to take him to the airport immediately
call a taxi service, roadside assistance, or a friend to get help
call a taxi, Uber or any similar service to transport him to the airport as soon as possible

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.

generation: immediately report the missing money to his supervisor or the owner of the bakery

immediately notify his supervisor or the owner of the bakery about the missing money

immediately report the missing money to his supervisor or higher management
review the transactions of the day to verify if there was a mistake in giving change or recording the sales
recheck his calculations and sales records to look for any mistakes or discrepancy

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
context_5.prompt: One thing that Brad should do is to
generation: stay put and not stray too far from where they are currently
build a shelter to protect them from the cold and extreme weather conditions
stay in one location
find a safe place to take shelter, gather any resources available nearby like firewood, and ration the remaining food and water
start creating smoke signals or makeshift distress signals to alert any planes or helicopters that might be searching for them, while also seeking or constructing a shelter to protect from the cold
stay in one place so that they are easier to find for the rescue crew
stay put and make his location visible
stay in one place
stay put and create some sort of signal that can be seen from the air, such as a large "X" in the snow or organizing bright objects in an open area
stay where they are
